Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate, peripheral blood, or tissue biopsy
Purpose: To detect cytogenetic abnormalities in hematologic disorders through comprehensive chromosome analysis.
Container: Heparinized syringe (bone marrow), sodium heparin tube (peripheral blood), or sterile transport media (tissue biopsy)
Equipment: Phase contrast microscope with fluorescence and karyotyping software, sterile culture flasks/plates, cell culture reagents, Colcemid, hypotonic solution, fixative, and staining agents
